name: MiraPatch LM
description: MiraPatch LM is a two-component, polymer-modified, cementitious underlayment and embedment mortar specifically designed for the encapsulation of expanded metal lath reinforcement when installing MiraFlex II Decking System over plywood substrates. MiraPatch LM is also suitable for a variety of uses including underlayment for tile, carpet, other flooring finishes, concrete surface repairs, leveling and sloping.
